TopicTitle: Completed Contracts showing up in strange places

Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone,

I noticed some strange behaviour of the completed contracts UI while switching between buildings in 1.0.

At the bottom of the screen, hidden by the clock and timewarp bar, pops up the green check that indicates completed contracts. By clicking, the infopanel for the last completed contract opens up. After dismissing the contract again the green check dissapeared and everything seems to run fine again.

I noticed it the first time after leaving the administration building.
